list.description:
Third Sight, Orca Edition

Shylily as requested by @solo_emperor
This one was pretty fun to do, way less lines that last time so i was able to add more detail.

Feel free to comment suggestions on what to do next, i will most likely do them. Do specify if you want it safer or on the lewder end.
Any tips with this would also be appreciated.


Also, try to keep it lighthearted in the comments, i'd appreciate it.

#anime #shylily #vtuber
Rio bikini #wtdraw #rio_tsukatsuki #blue_archive #bluearchive #anime

Miyabi from ZZZ

How to install:
-Create UserSights folder in your folder with installed WT
-Open folder "all_tanks"
-Copy everything from zip file to that folder
-Restart the game or launch it
-Go to Options -> Main -> Ground vehicle Battle Settings -> Sight settings
-Find "Redicle" on the right
-Switch Default grid sight to one of the custom sights.
-Done

#anime #anime_art #miyabi #zzz #zenlesszonezero #wtdraw

Today I made a Hoshino Ai sight. #anime #animegirl #oshinoko #wtdraw #ai_hoshino

Make: ws-rose
Size: GIG, BIG, NORMAL
Ver: RIGHT
#alltanks #alltank #girl #girls #booba #boobs #ws_rose

This has 3000 lines btw, credits to Asagamiyo. This will also be my last sight for now since I have university and failed a quiz. Hope you enjoy and please once again give credits to the artists, they probably take more time to make these since I take only two hours to trace. Also

"Chief, you mind telling why you have this picture of our ai?"
"Sir, finishing the goon."
